flake8-builtins.option:
Type: Flake8BuiltinsOptions/null
Status: DEPRECATED

Available Sub-options:
  - allowed-modules: List of builtin module names to allow.
  - builtins-allowed-modules: DEPRECATED: This option has been renamed to `allowed-modules`. Use `allowed-modules` instead.
  - builtins-ignorelist: DEPRECATED: This option has been renamed to `ignorelist`. Use `ignorelist` instead.
  - builtins-strict-checking: DEPRECATED: This option has been renamed to `strict-checking`. Use `strict-checking` instead.
  - ignorelist: Ignore list of builtins.
  - strict-checking: Compare module names instead of full module paths.
